fr_FR.description: Ce mod ajoute de nombreuses difficultés dans le jeu en rendant les adversaires plus intelligents, aussi bien les boss de fin de chapitre que le simple grouilleux, notamment par la gestion de l'intelligence de groupe. Il modifie également le comportement de certains sortilèges et comprend quelques ajustements cosmétiques ou de confort. Ce mod rend le jeu réellement plus difficile, soyez donc prêts... Ses  nombreux composants sont tous optionnels.

components.100: Installer en utilisant le mode batch (demande pour chaque composant avant de commencer l'installation) NE PAS UTILISER AVEC LE PROJECT INFINITY
components.1500: Inclure les sorts profanes d'Icewind Dale : Enhanced Edition
components.1510: Inclure les sorts divins/druidiques d'Icewind Dale : Enhanced Edition
components.1520: Inclure les chants de barde d'Icewind Dale : Enhanced Edition
components.1600: Utiliser les versions Baldur's Gate II des sorts Fleau d'insectes et Fatalite rampante a la place des versions d'Icewind Dale
components.1610: Utiliser la version Baldur's Gate II du sort Epee de Mordenkainen en plus de la version d'Icewind Dale
components.2000: Installer toutes les modifications de sorts (si vous ne selectionnez pas cette option, vous aurez la possibilite de les choisir par categorie)
components.2010: Composant principal des modifications du systeme de sort de Stratagems (installe par defaut par tout composant d'IA)
components.2020: Modifications inspirees de Baldur's Gate pour les sorts d'Icewind Dale
components.2030: Modifications des sorts de type Restauration
components.2040: Modifications des sorts de type Metamorphose
components.2050: Modifications inspirees d'Icewind Dale pour les sorts de Baldur's Gate/Baldur's Gate II
components.2060: Reequilibrage des sorts un peu trop puissants
components.2080: Augmentation de la puissance de certains sorts
components.2510: Ajouter 9 nouveaux sorts divins/druidiques (dont certains proviennent du mod Divine Remix)
components.2520: Revision des elementaires et des sorts de type Conjuration d'elementaire
components.2900: Deplacer ou modifier certains objets magiques trop puissants
components.3010: Remplacer les fleches et autres projectiles magiques +1 par des projectiles non-magiques de "maitre"
components.3015: Reintroduction des potions de grands soins
components.3017: Modifier les fleches elementaires pour qu'elles fonctionnent comme dans Baldur's Gate II
components.3020: Remplacer beaucoup d'armes magiques +1 par des armes non-magiques de "maitre"
components.choice_0: Remplacer beaucoup d'armes magiques +1 par des armes non-magiques de "maitre"
components.3021: Les armes de maitre sont immunisees a la crise du fer
components.3022: Les armes de maitre sont affectees par la crise du fer
components.choice_1: Reduire le nombre de fleches de dissipation dans les magasins
components.3040: Retirer les fleches de dissipation des magasins
components.3041: Les magasins vendent au maximum 5 fleches de dissipation
components.choice_2: Standardisation des sorts entre Baldur's Gate et Baldur's Gate II
components.3500: Retirer les sorts qui ne sont pas dans Baldur's Gate
components.3501: Introduction des parchemins de sorts de Baldur's Gate II dans Baldur's Gate
components.3505: Plus vaste selection aleatoire de parchemins de sorts
components.3510: Plus vaste selection de parchemins de sorts profanes dans Icewind Dale
components.choice_3: Reduire la puissance de la Dissipation de la magie des inquisiteurs
components.3540: Dissipation de la magie des inquisiteurs a 1,5 fois leur niveau actuel (et non deux fois)
components.3541: Dissipation de la magie des inquisiteurs a leur niveau actuel (et non deux fois)
components.choice_4: Augmenter la puissance des sorts de type Soins des blessures et Blessures au meme niveau que ceux de la 3eme edition de D&D
components.3551: Les sorts soignent ou infligent dans cette plage le maximum de degats
components.3552: Les sorts soignent ou infligent dans cette plage environ la moyenne de degats
components.4020: Loups et chiens sauvages plus realistes
components.choice_5: Reduire la vitesse a laquelle la reputation augmente
components.4050: La reputation augmente au deux tiers de sa vitesse normale
components.4051: La reputation augmente a la moitie de sa vitesse normale
components.4052: La reputation augmente au tiers de sa vitesse normale
components.4093: La reputation augmente au quart de sa vitesse normale
components.4099: Permettre au joueur de choisir les competences martiales et capacites des personnages non-joueurs
components.4100: Amelioration de la personnalisation et de la gestion des personnages non-joueurs
components.4115: Les roublards attribuent leurs points de talents de roublards par multiples de cinq
components.4130: Revision des effets de mort comme la desintegration, la petrification et l'emprisonnement (les membres du groupe qui sont desintegres ou autres peuvent etre ressuscites, les personnages emprisonnes ou petrifies rejoignent automatiquement le groupe, le jeu ne prend pas fin si le personnage principal est petrifie ou emprisonne)
components.4135: Revision du repos : se reposer en exterieur consomme des provisions
components.4140: Revision des chambres d'auberges : plus le prix est important, plus il y a d'avantages
components.choice_6: Passer les parties tutorielles de Chateau-Suif
components.4145: Retirer les personnages non-joueurs tutoriels de Chateau-Suif
components.4146: Passer entierement Chateau-Suif (attention : brise le 4eme mur !)
components.4150: Permettre aux Mages cagoules de deceler le lancement de sorts dans la plupart des zones interieures et souterraines d'Athkatla
components.choice_7: Augmenter le prix de la licence pour pratiquer la magie a Athkatla
components.choice_8: Augmenter le prix demande par Gaelan Bayle
components.4190: Rendre la Tour de Garde accessible entre les parties les Ombres de l'Amn et le Trone de Bhaal du jeu (attention : ceci la rendra inaccessible jusqu'a la fin de la partie les Ombres de l'Amn du jeu)
components.4210: Rendre aleatoire le labyrinthe de la Tour de Garde
components.4215: Retirer les objets exagerement opportuns de certaines regions
components.choice_9: Retirer les projectiles exagerement opportuns du jeu

components.4217: Retirer les projectiles jusqu'a +2 des conteneurs aleatoires
components.4218: Retirer tous les projectiles des conteneurs aleatoires
components.4230: Retarder l'arrivee des marchands bonus au Marche de l'Aventurier et a la Couronne de Cuivre
components.4240: Traiter les capacites de haut niveau des lanceurs de sorts profanes et des lanceurs de sorts divins/druidiques comme des capacites speciales plutot que comme des sorts memorisables (chacune ne pouvant etre acquise qu'une seule fois)
components.4250: Modifier les sorts de type Sequenceur de sorts et Contingence en capacites speciales
components.5000: Facilite d'utilisation de l'IA de groupe plus simple
components.5070: Changement esthetique : le sort Peau de pierre ne modifie plus la couleur du lanceur de sorts
components.5080: Amelioration des ecrans de chapitre de l'extension "la Legende de l'Ile Perdue"
components.5900: Initialisation des composants de l'IA (requis pour les composants tactiques et d'IA)
components.6020: IA generale plus intelligente et meilleurs appels a l'aide
components.6030: Lanceurs de sorts profanes plus intelligents
components.6040: Lanceurs de sorts divins/druidiques plus intelligents
components.6590: Antagoniste final du Trone de Bhaal plus intelligent
components.6700: Revision des morts-vivants de Icewind Dale
components.6840: Les versions d'Irenicus et de Sendai du mod Ascension utilisent les capacites et l'IA de SCS
components.6850: Les demons du mod Ascension utilisent les capacites et l'IA de SCS
components.7010: Gardes des Griffes Noires et du Trone de Fer plus coriaces
components.7080: Fanatiques du culte du demon ameliores
components.7200: Combat final du chapitre deux plus difficile
components.7210: Combat final du chapitre trois plus difficile
components.7220: Combat final du chapitre quatre plus difficile
components.7230: Combat final du chapitre cinq plus difficile
components.8000: Rendre le donjon d'Irenicus legerement plus difficile
components.8040: Ajuster la difficulte des regroupements de monstres en fonction du curseur de difficulte
components.8060: Chateau de'Arnise ameliore (inspire du mod Tactics)
components.8085: La version de Bodhi du mod Ascension utilise les capacites ameliorees de Bodhi
components.8090: Les objets des membres du groupe leur sont enleves a Spellhold
components.8100: Combat contre Irenicus a Spellhold ameliore
components.8130: Reequilibrage de la regeneration des trolls
components.8160: Temple des geants de feu ameliore

en_US.description: This mod adds a number of new challenges to the game by making opponents more intelligent, whether they be end-of-chapter bosses or just plain crawlers, notably by managing group intelligence. It also modifies the behavior of certain spells and includes a few cosmetic and comfort adjustments. This mod really does make the game more difficult, so get ready... Its many components are all optional.

components.100: Install in batch mode (ask about all components before starting installation). DO NOT USE WITH PROJECT INFINITY.
components.1500: Include arcane spells from Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
components.1510: Include divine spells from Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
components.1520: Include bard songs from Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
components.1600: Use Baldur's Gate-style Insect Plague and Creeping Doom instead of Icewind Dale versions
components.1610: Use Baldur's Gate-style Mordenkainen's Sword in addition to Icewind Dale version
components.2000: Install all spell tweaks (if you don't select this, you will be given a chance to choose by category)
components.2010: Core Stratagems spell-system changes (installed by default by any AI component)
components.2020: Baldur's Gate-inspired tweaks to Icewind Dale spells
components.2050: Icewind Dale-inspired tweaks to Baldur's Gate/Baldur's Gate II spells
components.2510: Add 6 new divine spells (some borrowed from Divine Remix)
components.2900: Move or modify some overpowered magic items
components.3010: Replace +1 arrows and other projectiles with nonmagical "fine" ones
components.3020: Replace many +1 magic weapons with nonmagical "fine" ones
components.choice_0: Replace many +1 magic weapons with nonmagical "fine" ones
components.3021: Fine weapons are immune to the iron crisis
components.3022: Fine weapons are affected by the iron crisis
components.choice_1: Reduce the number of Arrows of Dispelling in stores
components.3040: Remove Arrows of Dispelling from stores
components.3041: Stores sell a maximum of 5 Arrows of Dispelling
components.choice_2: Standardise spells between BG and BG2
components.3501: Introduce BG2 spell scrolls into BG1
components.3510: Wider availability of wizard spell scrolls in Icewind Dale
components.choice_3: Reduce the power of Inquisitors' Dispel Magic
components.3540: Inquisitors dispel at 1.5 x their level (not twice their level)
components.3541: Inquisitors dispel at their level (not twice their level)
components.choice_4: Increase the power of Cure Wounds and Cause Wounds spells to the level found in 3rd Edition D&D
components.3551: Spells heal or inflict the maximum amount of damage in this range
components.3552: Spells heal or inflict about the average amount of damage in this range
components.4020: More realistic wolves and wild dogs
components.choice_5: Decrease the rate at which reputation improves
components.4050: Reputation increases at about 2/3 the normal rate
components.4051: Reputation increases at about 1/2 the normal rate
components.4052: Reputation increases at about 1/3 the normal rate
components.4093: Reputation increases at about 1/4 the normal rate
components.4099: Allow player to choose NPC proficiencies and skills
components.4115: Thieves assign skill points in multiples of five
components.4130: Revised handling of death effects like disintegration, petrification and imprisonment (party members who are disintegrated etc can be resurrected; imprisoned or petrified characters rejoin the party automatically; the game doesn't end if the main character is petrified or imprisoned)
components.4135: Revised resting: resting in the wild uses up provisions
components.4140: Revised inn rooms: more expensive, more benefits
components.4145: Remove the tutorial NPCs from Candlekeep
components.4146: Skip Candlekeep altogether (warning: breaks the 4th wall!)
components.4150: Allow the Cowled Wizards to detect spellcasting in most indoor, above-ground areas in Athkatla
components.choice_7: Increase the price of a license to practise magic in Athkatla
components.choice_8: Increase the price asked by Gaelan Bayle
components.4190: Make Watchers' Keep accessible between SoA and ToB (warning: this will make it inaccessible until the end of SoA)
components.4210: Randomize the maze in Watcher's Keep
components.4215: Remove unrealistically helpful items from certain areas
components.choice_9: Remove unrealistically convenient ammunition from the game
components.4216: Only remove nonmagical ammo from random containers
components.4217: Remove ammo up to the +2 level from random containers
components.4218: Remove all ammo from random containers
components.4230: Delay the arrival of the "bonus merchants" in the Adventurers' Mart and the Copper Coronet
components.4240: Treat mages' and priests' High-Level Abilities as innate abilities rather than memorisable spells (each may be taken only once)
components.4250: Make spell sequencers and contingencies into innate abilities
components.5070: Cosmetic change: stop Stoneskins from changing the caster's colour
components.5900: Initialise AI components (required for all tactical and AI components)
components.6020: Smarter general AI and better calls for help
components.6590: Smarter Throne of Bhaal final villain
components.6840: Ascension versions of Irenicus and Sendai use SCS abilities and AI
components.6850: Ascension demons use SCS abilities and AI
components.7010: Tougher Black Talons and Iron Throne guards
components.7020: Improved deployment for parties of assassins
components.8000: Make the starting dungeon slightly harder
components.8040: Tie difficulty of level-dependent monster groupings to the difficulty slider
components.8085: Ascension version of Bodhi uses Improved-Bodhi abilities
components.8090: Party's items are taken from them in Spellhold
components.8100: Improved battle with Irenicus in Spellhold

zh_CN.description: 这个模组通过使对手更聪明来增加游戏中的许多难度，无论是章节末尾的Boss还是普通的小怪，特别是通过群体智能的管理。它还修改了某些法术的行为，并包含一些外观或便利性上的调整。这个模组确实让游戏变得更难，所以请做好准备……它的许多组件都是可选的。

components.100: 以批量模式安装（在开始安装之前询问所有组件）。*不要与PROJECT INFINITY一起使用。*
components.1500: 包括冰风谷增强版中的法师法术
components.1510: 包括冰风谷增强版中的牧师神术
components.1520: 包括冰风谷：增强版的吟游诗人战歌
components.1600: 使用博德之门风格的疫病虫群和漫天虫蚀，而不是冰风谷版本
components.1610: 除了冰风谷版本外，还可以使用博德之门风格的魔邓肯之剑
components.2000: 安装所有的法术调整（如果你不选择这个，你将有机会按类别进行选择）
components.2010: 核心策略法术系统更改（默认由任何AI组件安装）
components.2020: 受博德之门启发的对冰风谷法术的调整
components.2050: 受冰风谷启发的对博德之门/博德之门II法术的调整
components.2060: 稍微过于强大的法术的重新平衡
components.2510: 增加6个新神术 （有些是从Divine Remix借用的）
components.2900: 移动或修改过强的魔法物品
components.3010: 将+1的箭支改换为普通的精良版本
components.3015: 恢复游戏原有的超级强效医疗药水
components.3020: 把多种+1的附魔武器替换为无附魔的精制武器
components.choice_0: 把多种+1的附魔武器替换为无附魔的精制武器
components.3021: 精制武器不受铁矿危机的影响
components.3022: 精制武器也受铁矿危机的影响
components.choice_1: 减少商店中破魔箭的数量
components.3041: 商店出售的破魔箭最大数量只有5支
components.choice_2: 使 BG1 和 BG2 的法术获取过程更合理
components.3500: 移除 BG1 中不存在的法术
components.3501: 引入 BG2 的法术卷轴到 BG1
components.3505: 扩展随机卷轴的覆盖范围
components.3510: 在冰风谷中扩展法师法术卷轴的使用
components.choice_3: 降低审判者解除魔法的能力
components.3540: 审判者的解除魔法成功率以自身等级的1.5倍计算（不再是2倍）
components.3541: 审判者的解除魔法成功率以自身实际等级计算（不再是2倍）
components.choice_4: 提高造成/治疗伤害法术的能力至三版 DND 水平
components.3551: 法术将造成/治疗的最大伤害量在该范围内
components.3552: 法术将造成/治疗的平均伤害量在该范围内
components.4020: 行为更真实的狼与野狗
components.choice_5: 降低声望值的提升速度
components.4050: 声望提升速度是原版的2/3
components.4051: 声望提升速度是原版的1/2
components.4052: 声望提升速度是原版的1/3
components.4093: 声望提升速度是原版的1/4
components.4099: 允许玩家选择 NPC 的武器特长和盗贼技能
components.4100: 强化 NPC 定制与管理
components.4115: 盗贼将以五倍的水平分配技能点（只是方便性的调整）
components.4130: 修改了对死亡效果的处理，如解体、石化和监禁（被解体的队员可以复活；被监禁或石化的角色自动重新加入队伍；如果主角被石化或监禁，游戏不会结束）
components.4135: 修订后的休息：野外休息会用完给养
components.4140: 修改后的旅馆房间：更贵，更有益
components.4146: 跳过全部的烛堡部分（警告：将破坏第四堵墙）
components.4150: 使蒙面法师可以侦测阿斯卡特拉大部分室内区域的施法状况

components.4190: 使巴尔王座剧情从观察者堡垒开始 （警告：这将使观察者堡垒在安姆阴影剧情结束时才能访问）
components.4210: 使观察者堡垒内的迷宫随机化
components.4215: 移除特定区域中不应存在的协助类物品
components.choice_9: 移除特定区域中不应存在的弹药
components.4216: 只移除随机容器中的非魔法弹药

components.4218: 移除随机容器中所有弹药
components.4230: 冒险者集市与铜冠酒店的“秘密商人”延迟出现
components.4240: 法师和牧师的高阶技能改为天生能力，不需记忆就能使用（但每天只能使用一次）
components.4250: 让法术定序和意外术成为天赋能力
components.5070: 美化改变：石肤术不再改变人物的肤色
components.5900: 初始化 AI 组件（其他战术或 AI 组件的必备前置组件）
components.6020: 更聪明的普通 AI 和更好的呼救系统
components.6300: 更聪明的海妖女和树精
components.6590: 更聪明的巴尔王座最终战
components.6700: 修订后的冰风谷不死生物
components.6840: Ascension 版本的艾瑞尼卡斯和仙黛使用 SCS 中的能力和 AI
components.6850: Ascension 版本的恶魔使用 SCS 中的能力和 AI
components.7010: 强化黑爪兵团和铁王座守卫
components.7020: 强化刺杀小队出现的部署
components.7040: 重新分配赏金猎人的位置
components.7150: 增强卡莎/喀尔可的交互
components.8000: 稍微提高序章地牢的难度
components.8040: 难度关联等级的怪物也关联游戏难度选项
components.8085: 让 Ascension 版本中的芭荻使用 SCS “强化芭荻”组件中的能力
components.8090: 在禁魔监狱中移除队伍装备
components.8100: 提高禁魔监狱中艾瑞尼卡斯战役的难度
components.8130: 再平衡巨魔的再生能力

components.100: Instalar en modo batch (pregunta por todos los componentes antes de iniciar la instalacion). NO UTILIZAR CON PROJECT INFINITY.

components.1610: Usa la espada de Mordenkainen al estilo de Baldur's Gate además de la versión de Icewind Dale.
components.2000: Instalar todos los ajustes de hechizos (si no seleccionas esto, se te dará la oportunidad de elegir por categoria)
components.2010: Cambios en el sistema de hechizos de Stratagems basico (instalado por defecto por cualquier componente de IA)
components.2020: Ajustes inspirados en Baldur's Gate para los hechizos de Icewind Dale
components.2030: Cambios en los hechizos de restauracion
components.2040: Cambios en los hechizos de cambio de forma

components.2070: Cambios en la escuela de hechizos

components.3540: Los inquisidores disipan a 1.5 x su nivel (no el doble de su nivel)
components.3541: Los inquisidores disipan a su nivel (no al doble de su nivel)

components.4052: La reputacion aumenta 1/3 respecto a lo normal

components.4099: Permitir al jugador elegir las competencias y habilidades de los PNJ
components.4100: Mejora de la personalizacion y gestion de los PNJ

components.4099: Permetti al giocatore di scegliere abilita e capacita dei PNG
components.4100: Migliorata caratterizzazione e gestione degli PNG
components.4115: I ladri ottengono punti abilita in multipli di cinque
components.4130: Gestione rivista degli effetti di morte come la disintegrazione, la pietrificazione e l'imprigionamento (i membri del gruppo che vengono disintegrati ecc. possono essere resuscitati, i personaggi imprigionati o pietrificati si ricongiungono automaticamente al gruppo, il gioco non termina se il personaggio principale viene pietrificato o imprigionato)
components.4135: Riposo rivisto: riposare in natura consuma le provviste
components.4140: Camere delle locande riviste: piu costose, piu vantaggi
components.4145: Rimuovi i PNGs tutorial da Candlekeep
components.4146: Rimuovi Candlekeep in ogni caso (attenzione: corrompe il quarto muro!)
components.4150: Permetti agli Stregoni Incappucciati di individuare il lancio di incantesimi in molti luoghi al coperto, nel territorio di Athkatla
components.choice_7: Aumenta il prezzo della licenza per praticare la magia in Athkatla
components.choice_8: Incrementa il prezzo chiesto da Gaelan Bayle
components.4190: Rendi la Fortezza dell'Osservatore accessibile tra SoA e ToB
components.4210: Rendi casuale il labirinto nella Fortezza dell'Osservatore
components.4215: Rimuovere oggetti irrealisticamente utili da alcune aree
components.choice_9: Rimuovere munizioni irrealisticamente convenienti da alcune aree
components.4216: Rimuovi solo le munizioni non magiche dai contenitori casuali
components.4217: Rimuovi le munizioni con bonus migliore di +2 dai contenitori casuali
components.4218: Rimuovi tutte le munizioni dai contenitori casuali
components.4230: Ritarda l'arrivo dei "Mercanti bonus" nell'Emporio dell'Avventuriero e al Diadema di Rame
components.4240: Gestisce le Abilita di Alto Livello dei maghi e dei preti come capacita innate piuttosto che come magie memorizzabili (ognuna puo essere presa solo una volta)
components.4250: Trasforma i sequenziatori, gli attivatori e le contingenze in abilita innate
components.5070: Cambiamenti all'aspetto: impedisci a Pelle di Pietra di cambiare il colore del tuo personaggio
components.5080: Migliori schermate di testo in Tales of the Sword Coast
components.5900: Inizializza componenti di IA (richiesto per tutte le componenti tattiche e di IA)
components.6020: IA generale migliorata e migliori richieste di aiuto
components.6700: Rivisti i non morti in Icewind Dale
components.6840: Dai alle versioni di Ascension di Irenicus e Sendai gli script e le capacita di SCSII
components.6850: Conferisci ai Demoni di Ascension gli script e le capacita di SCSII
components.7010: Artigli Neri e guardie del Trono di Ferro piu forti
components.7020: Schieramenti migliorati per i gruppi di assassini
components.7030: Coboldi migliorati come su Dark Side of the Swords Coast

components.8085: La versione Ascension di Bodhi usa le abilita di Bodhi migliorata

components.100: Install in batch mode (ask about all components before starting installation). DO NOT USE WITH PROJECT INFINITY.
components.1500: Include arcane spells from Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
components.1510: Include divine spells from Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
components.1520: Include bard songs from Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
components.1600: Use Baldur's Gate-style Insect Plague and Creeping Doom instead of Icewind Dale versions
components.1610: Use Baldur's Gate-style Mordenkainen's Sword in addition to Icewind Dale version
components.2000: Install all spell tweaks (if you don't select this, you will be given a chance to choose by category)
components.2010: Core Stratagems spell-system changes (installed by default by any AI component)
components.2020: Baldur's Gate-inspired tweaks to Icewind Dale spells
components.2050: Icewind Dale-inspired tweaks to Baldur's Gate/Baldur's Gate II spells
components.2510: Add 6 new divine spells (some borrowed from Divine Remix)
components.2900: Move or modify some overpowered magic items
components.3010: Replace +1 arrows and other projectiles with nonmagical "fine" ones
components.3020: Replace many +1 magic weapons with nonmagical "fine" ones
components.choice_0: Replace many +1 magic weapons with nonmagical "fine" ones
components.3021: Fine weapons are immune to the iron crisis
components.3022: Fine weapons are affected by the iron crisis
components.choice_1: Reduce the number of Arrows of Dispelling in stores
components.3040: Remove Arrows of Dispelling from stores
components.3041: Stores sell a maximum of 5 Arrows of Dispelling
components.choice_2: Standardise spells between BG and BG2
components.3501: Introduce BG2 spell scrolls into BG1
components.3510: Wider availability of wizard spell scrolls in Icewind Dale
components.choice_3: Reduce the power of Inquisitors' Dispel Magic
components.3540: Inquisitors dispel at 1.5 x their level (not twice their level)
components.3541: Inquisitors dispel at their level (not twice their level)
components.choice_4: Increase the power of Cure Wounds and Cause Wounds spells to the level found in 3rd Edition D&D
components.3551: Spells heal or inflict the maximum amount of damage in this range
components.3552: Spells heal or inflict about the average amount of damage in this range
components.4020: More realistic wolves and wild dogs
components.choice_5: Decrease the rate at which reputation improves
components.4050: Reputation increases at about 2/3 the normal rate
components.4051: Reputation increases at about 1/2 the normal rate
components.4052: Reputation increases at about 1/3 the normal rate
components.4093: Reputation increases at about 1/4 the normal rate
components.4099: Allow player to choose NPC proficiencies and skills
components.4115: Thieves assign skill points in multiples of five
components.4130: Revised handling of death effects like disintegration, petrification and imprisonment (party members who are disintegrated etc can be resurrected; imprisoned or petrified characters rejoin the party automatically; the game doesn't end if the main character is petrified or imprisoned)
components.4135: Revised resting: resting in the wild uses up provisions
components.4140: Revised inn rooms: more expensive, more benefits
components.4145: Remove the tutorial NPCs from Candlekeep
components.4146: Skip Candlekeep altogether (warning: breaks the 4th wall!)
components.4150: Allow the Cowled Wizards to detect spellcasting in most indoor, above-ground areas in Athkatla
components.choice_7: Increase the price of a license to practise magic in Athkatla
components.choice_8: Increase the price asked by Gaelan Bayle
components.4190: Make Watchers' Keep accessible between SoA and ToB (warning: this will make it inaccessible until the end of SoA)
components.4210: Randomize the maze in Watcher's Keep
components.4215: Remove unrealistically helpful items from certain areas
components.choice_9: Remove unrealistically convenient ammunition from the game
components.4216: Only remove nonmagical ammo from random containers
components.4217: Remove ammo up to the +2 level from random containers
components.4218: Remove all ammo from random containers
components.4230: Delay the arrival of the "bonus merchants" in the Adventurers' Mart and the Copper Coronet
components.4240: Treat mages' and priests' High-Level Abilities as innate abilities rather than memorisable spells (each may be taken only once)
components.4250: Make spell sequencers and contingencies into innate abilities

components.6020: Smarter general AI and better calls for help
components.6590: Smarter Throne of Bhaal final villain

components.6850: Ascension demons use SCS abilities and AI
